critique: The document aims to elicit joy from the American public by restoring accountability and eliminating waste. It also aims to instill a sense of fear in government employees who are not performing their duties or are misusing government resources. There is also an element of disgust towards the waste and bloat in the federal bureaucracy. Surprise is not a primary emotion being conveyed. Sadness may be felt by those who are affected by the RIFs, but the overall tone is one of optimism and reform.
